EmailTemplate.name: Intern decline - intern
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You declined an invitation to gain experience hours. Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is inactive.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You declined an invitation to gain experience hours under the supervision of {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is inactive.
You canâ€™t gain experience hours until you accept an invitation from a sponsor.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI019
